website_summaries.verdict: This metallic and glass-inspired doorbell offers CD quality sound and a design that minimizes interference.
pros: A self-learning system cuts down on interference from other wireless sources
Can pair the receiver with up to 6 transmitters or triggers
cons: The older the batteries get, the less range this unit has
Some claim the button has to be pressed really hard or it won't ring

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell is a name I trust - rock solid wireless doorbell replacement
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid doorbell - was easy to install, put the ringer in our dining room, hidden at the top of china cabinet -- and it sounds great (plenty loud). Takes some C batteries but seems to last a very long time as I haven't replaced since buying. Honeywell products seem rock solid to me, just go for this brand. The ringer is nice enough ;looking that you could mount anywhere on a wall if you wanted to. I'd get this over some cheap no name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Savage

customer_reviews.title: Ding Dong
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wireless doorbell. Love the quality of the sound. My old rickety one sounded like a British Ambulance...oh my! I love that it has volume control as I live in a studio. I won't use any other features this product has to offer however, having the capability to keep volume somewhat lower was a big concern of mine. The chime box is rather heavy once you insert the four C batteries, so I will wait until I can borrow a drill or wait for my maintenance man to securely install being I live in an old building. Meanwhile.... I put it on top of a bookcase. Works great. Very stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: Fredericm

customer_reviews.title: Loud Enough and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, after a few months use. It was very simply to install, and looks nice on the wall, which was an issue to me due to where I needed to mount it in central location to be heard throughout the house. The programmable chime options are nice and easy to use. Enough variety to find something you are happy with I'm sure. An nice option is available. I got a second button which issues a different chime sound, so I know whether its being pressed at front door or back door. Honeywell has been around forever, and this is right up their alley for good basic electronic products.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Ware

customer_reviews.title: Good range and sound
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with variety of sounds and handsome modern look. Loud enough to hear anywhere in the house and volume control is adjusrable. First unit bought was GE remote unit and it stopped one month later.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice doorbell - not metal or glass
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell works well and looks nice, but "metallic and glass inspired" apparently means it looks a bit like metal and glass but is actually made of nicely finished plastic. The cover of the inside unit is 6 inches by 8 inches, and the part that touches the wall is approximately 5 inches by 6 inches. It can be mounted horizontally or vertically, and it runs on 4 C cell batteries, which are not provided. The wall anchors that came with the unit didn't work very well, so you might want to buy your own. The outside button comes with a piece of double sided foam tape for easy installation (two screws are also included).
customer_reviews.author: gippy

customer_reviews.title: Functions as expected and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an existing wireless doorbell that became a little temperamental and didn't always ring. Works as expected and the inside unit coordinates nicely with our home's decor.
customer_reviews.author: MarrE

customer_reviews.title: Wireless is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Honeywell RCWL3501A100/N Wireless doorbell because the wiring in my 50 year old wired doorbell finally gave out and quit working completely. I ordered an extra push button to go with the push button that came with the unit in hopes that I could hook both up at different doors and use the same chime, but that hasn't been the case so far. Still, I like the chimes selection and doorbell combination I received. I set the chimes up at a central place in the house in hopes I could hear it when I'm downstairs as well as upstairs and so far it's working great. I just don't have a doorbell button at the basement or back door.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Range is great! Sound is very loud
customer_reviews.text: Range is great! Sound is very loud, not sure what others are talking about, that you cant hear it! Added another remote to it and it was easy. The separate remotes will ring a different tone.
customer_reviews.author: Mnsunnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very stylish and it solved the problem I was having with my other wireless doorbell. A neighbor across the street also had purchased a wireless doorbell that was exactly like the one I had. I found that my doorbell rang when someone was at the neighbor's house! Now that I have this unit, the problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Txbuyer

customer_reviews.title: This door chime system has been a good value so far
customer_reviews.text: Our old hard-wired doorbell died so I decided to try this wireless system from Honeywell. It has been working perfectly for over one year. I bought a second push button to use at the driveway entrance - the programmable distinct tones let us know which push button is being pushed. This door chime system has been a good value so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent doorbell! Don't even bother trying to rewire an ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent doorbell! Don't even bother trying to rewire an old door bell, this saved me a lot of trouble and sounds fantastic, clear and loud and the sounds it has are excellent. Just like a good quality wired doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Door Chime for any home.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek contemporary design. Sounds are pleasant. Being wireless makes it so convenient to put this Door Chime in any room of the house. Also you have the option to purchase a second door button and have a different sound for each door.
customer_reviews.author: FON

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have this wireless unit for three weeks I'm very happy with it performance Ive owned Two other makes and the Constant resetting because of connectivity, this unit is three times more money BUT ITS WORTH EVERY PENNY . I WOULD SAY DONT GO CHEAP SPEND A LITTEL MORE AND YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: MANNIX 33

customer_reviews.title: Love the doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Love the doorbell. I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 due to the instructions. The bell is wonderful. I'm selling my house and buyers have even commented on how attractive it is. The manual needs work though.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth RH

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought. Works great. First one has been working without a hitch for 5 years. This one will act as an extender to another area of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell RCWL3501A1004/N Wireless door chime
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, the sound is great, loud if you like or soft if you like.. I did not attach this to the wall, I put it on a folding book or picture frame stand, works well and is very good looking and I can move it from room to room or take it outside and it works everywhere.. I put the push button by the garage door opening to my kitchen where it seems everybody wants to come in and it is almost impossible to hear a knock if you are somewhere else other than in the kitchen ,and it doesn't help if you are a little hard of hearing either, problem solved...
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Time

customer_reviews.title: Although easy to install you have to push the button really ...
customer_reviews.text: Although easy to install you have to push the button really hard or it doesn't work. Most people can't even push it hard enough to work. If I still had the box I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: DARIN RIEMANN

customer_reviews.title: This is super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to set up. Has worked very reliably for the first several months of use. Chime is loud enough to hear upstairs. Our unit is about 30ft from the door button and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: PA Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: My elder mother lives with me and very hard of ...
customer_reviews.text: My elder mother lives with me and very hard of hearing. Due to adjustment of volume she can hear this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue33

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Easy to program and install. Instructions were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS V CLEMENT

customer_reviews.title: Almost classy alternative to wired units
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well. Sound strong and it saved me from having to run wires behind my walls. Have two bells set up one near the main unit and the second at the back door about 40 feet away from the unit. Both work just the same with the back door unit having to go through 4 walls. Only wish they had nicer door units.
customer_reviews.author: 30something shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great item and super easy to install which was really important to me. The choice of different sounds are enough and easy to set up too. Over all it's a great product and I'm very happy with it. I really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doorbell for the office. Works well paired with two doorbell buttons on the opposite sides of the building. I like the fact that we could set up different ring ton for the front and back door.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for our several year long problem of having a broken doorbell... no need to rewire anything.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to remove the old hard-wired door bell system and this is the answer. Easy to install and it works great. Much cheaper than an electrician and holes in my wall. Nice looking to hang just about anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Buy This
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying to work with a wireless doorbell from Lowes for a couple of years, finally ended up tossing it. This unit worked right out of the box, super easy to set up and always works. The best thing is, it was actually less money then the one from Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: You can change the "tune" fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: People comment on the chimes all the time. You can change the "tune" fairly easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need a door bell, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I see this sooner. Fantastic! Easy install and you can have a really loud ring or soft.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Old house poor wiring
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular one because I could add another bell to it. My house is old so it needs many upgrades ,this solved the door bell problem with out a visit from the electrician . works great and sounds great?
customer_reviews.author: nana lininger

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase a wireless doorbell after not being able to locate the transformer (previous owner removed it). This was a breeze to setup, however, it's cheap looking and the doorbell sounds a little lackluster. That being said, it was inexpensive and it gets the job done. For $30, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good and I like that I can move it from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: tdvedo

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great product with good price the problem is with the shipping the packaging was in adequate and I received a broken cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Lezten

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks pretty good too. A small amount of latency between button push and chime, otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CT FLIER

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre sound and does NOT work with extra push buttons as claimed
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as advertised. Unfortunately we did not install it until after the 30 day return period was up but it does not work with even ONE extra push button let alone six. The sound quality is also somewhat tinny.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with the doorbell. It was easy to install and works like a charm. I would have liked a few more tone options but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It is what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: We needed a doorbell that work would for 2 doors. Bought this plus one push button for extra door. We set up different chimes and works great so far. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mstexoma

customer_reviews.title: Second doorbell in forty years
customer_reviews.text: Great product...did everything as described and more! Excellent product! Great sounds, Great style....... Would buy again if I need another doorbell!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Door Chime Review
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I had a different one that I had purchased locally, but it never was reliable. This one works great and I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: works as expected easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: no problem so far, works as expected easy to operate, looks great
customer_reviews.author: Brody Vins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not a thing to complain about, decent range and loud. According to the notes it's been around for a number of years so that gives me confidence that it will be long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: riverridge01

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell system is great, it saved me a lot of time and trouble trying to rewire the old doorbell in this fifty year old house.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Powers

customer_reviews.title: it installed like a breeze and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This is a first- class product. The only trouble I had was getting it out of the package. Once opened, it installed like a breeze and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a bit less than a year and then the push button died.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell RCWL3501A1004/N Decor Wireless Door Chime and Push Button
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I needed. Great Sound. The Model worked well with my décor. It's really very nice. I recommend it to anyone looking for this sort of door chime.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This one works perfectly and looks amazing. Glad I found this doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Had previously purchased 3 additional wireless doorbells and none seemed to work right. This one works perfectly and looks amazing. Glad I found this doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: mfdez

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and works well.
customer_reviews.text: More attractive than local products at Lowes and Home Depot. Has several different chime options. Very clearly heard. We just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: A Great door chime
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this were great, and I agree! I would recommend this highly! The volume control and choice of chimes is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: kathsstargazer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great had to go through a few wireless door bells till I found this one...
customer_reviews.author: Lana S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that works
customer_reviews.text: Third wireless doorbell I have purchased and the first to work for longer than a month. So far no issues, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good wireless for bell, easy to install and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far a good loud reliable wireless doorbell. Easy to setup also.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon Teague Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works like a charm....needed an easy and attractive fix when my wired doorbell gave out, and this was an inexpensive and hassle free solution.
customer_reviews.author: Krista M Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: works as describe, awesome customer service. easy set up, very loud and most of all good price. very happy with product
customer_reviews.author: jun

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Chimes are loud enough (you can set the volume.) Chimes are pleasant and you can choose some pretty normal "doorbell" type sounds. Still working after several months. My friend helped me install and then bought this for his house, too. I bought an extra doorbell for the back door which was also easy to install and sync with the system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good, and loud
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with it. Can be set to play very loud. Batteries in main unit last a long time. The remote batteries don't last as long. A nicer/slimmer remote unit would be welcome.
customer_reviews.author: A. Santabarbara

customer_reviews.title: Works well (for 6 months)
customer_reviews.text: I have returned several wireless doorbells. The distance from my front door to the inside unit is only 34 feet. But there are 3 walls between the sender and receiver. Our door is steel core. The Honeywell unit makes the distance easily. Adjustable volume and multiple chimes. All I need. Dec 8, 2013 Unit no longer functions.
customer_reviews.author: Elect. Eng.

customer_reviews.title: so good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 other wireless for bells (different brand) that only worked a couple of months. Only had this about a month, so good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works well great price and easy to install. Make sure you buy batteries for the door chime the batteries are sold separate.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Did not work properly
customer_reviews.text: At first we thought it was a battery problem but for some reason the wireless connection was not working properly
customer_reviews.author: LIDICE LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I am going to return it. It worked when I first installed it, but it must have a short because now that I have it screwed into the wall, it doesn't ring.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lee Kauhane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap...Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This didn't even come out of the box. It looks so crummy and cheap it had to do back. I've no idea what it sounds like but my guess is that it's cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great door bell!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The only thing I don't like is the round battery in the push bell. But so far, after 2 weeks, the battery is still holding up. We can hear the chimes from anywhere in the house, even from upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze300

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell was easy to install and the sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Went from packaging to install in less then 5 min. Perfect for a simple no frills doorbell
customer_reviews.author: Your Public Name

product_meta.title: Honeywell RCWL3501A1004/N Decor Wireless Doorbell / Door Chime and Push Button
product_meta.description:
Honeywell RCWL3501A1004/N Decor Wireless Doorbell / Door Chime and Push Button

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A simple contemporary design describes this metallic and glass inspired décor wireless chime from Honeywell. Hang this chime vertically or horizontally to fit your style or cover up existing holes. This premium door chime works with up to six (6) push buttons, motion detectors, or window and door contacts for added security, or motion detectors for peace of mind inside and out. The RCWL3501A also features six (6) selectable chime tunes, fully adjustable volume, CD quality sound, and low battery indicators on the push button and the door chime. Enjoy a stylish addition to your home decor with a premium decorative door chime from Honeywell.
feature_bullets: Works with up to six (6) push buttons, motion detectors or door contacts for added security and convenience
Six (6) chime tunes and fully adjustable volume
Self learning code system automatically adjusts to eliminate interference

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
